content:
hmmm, interesting
it doesn't look like it changes anything practically, as the listed corporations were already working together anyway
so, perhaps it's mostly an appeal to folks that still haven't hopped aboard MCP due to governance concerns? :shrug:

good to see Block in the mix, although I've still not got goose working with local+offline models
that's my blocker for getting series with agents, at least until I'm forced to adopt a cloud+subscription model (e.g. if my employment depends upon it)
